DataElement.preferredDefinition: The time of measurement represented in an unambiguous time format (e.g., hh:mm:ss).

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record time of measurement (as complete as possible).

ReferenceDocuments.name: VSDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable VSDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: A single collection time (e.g., VSTIM) may be collected for all the measurements when they are performed at the same time. The time of each measurement can also be collected using a CDASH variable [VSTESTCD]_VSTIM.

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the time of the meas
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the time of the measurement(s)?
